name: Nonogram - Logic Color Picture
description:
Enjoy the fun of playing our Nonogram – classic logic coloring game with numbers. Keep filling the grid by clicking the board to finally unlock a fancy picture. Exercise your logical thinking with nonogram.



nonogram is an addictive brain exercise game. Reveal hidden images on the puzzle pages based on the numbers lined up in both directions! Eventually you will unlock an interesting picture. Whenever you complete all the pictures of the same theme, you will get the cover picture of that theme and unlock more interesting new content.



Here Are Some Tips for playing:

- Look at the numbers at the end of the rows and columns;

- Play easy and medium nanogram puzzles just for brain-training and fun, or choose hard nonogram game to improve your skills!

- Get extra lives if you’ve made a mistake in a logic picture crossword.

- Develop the good habit of filling in “X”.
